name: safe-func
description: A collection of type-safe utility functions for binding, applying, calling, and executing functions in JavaScript.

scripts.build: npm run del:build && tsc -p .tsconfig/tsconfig.dist.json || npm run del:build
scripts.build:test: npm run del:test && tsc -p .tsconfig/tsconfig.test.json || npm run del:test
scripts.build:pack: npm run build && npm pack && npm run del:build || npm run del:build
scripts.test: npm run build:test && mocha && npm run del:test || npm run del:test
scripts.test:min: npm run build:test && mocha --reporter min && npm run del:test || npm run del:test
scripts.test:nyan: npm run build:test && mocha --reporter nyan && npm run del:test || npm run del:test
scripts.pack:dry: npm run build && npm pack --dry-run && npm run del:build || npm run del:build
